summary.Title: Metal Caster - Denmark
summary.Presentation: Are you looking for new challenges and do you have experience with metalworking? At Idé-Pro we are extremely busy and are therefore looking for another metal caster for our metal department in

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you looking for new challenges and do you have experience with metalworking? At Idé-Pro we are extremely busy and are therefore looking for another metal caster for our metal department in Skive.

As a metal caster at Idé-Pro, you will be part of a larger team in our metal department, with other metal casters who handle our four high-pressure die casting machines.

Primary tasks
• Set up/run tools on our HPDC machines (Frech and ItalPresse).
• Melting light metal (aluminium, zinc and magnesium) analysing it.
• Provide feedback on projects to designers/project managers.
• Perform quality control and continuous improvement.

Who are you
• You preferably have experience from a similar position, or experience in handling and working with metal.
• You work independently and are quality conscious.
• You can keep an overview even when you have multiple tasks at the same time

What can we offer?
• A full-time permanent employment with day shifts.
• Salary: around 180 DKK per hour depending on experience and education.
• An exciting and challenging job in a dynamic, high-tech well-consolidated company.
• A good informal working atmosphere with dynamic and competent colleagues.
• Challenges and a fast pace in everyday life.
• Good working and employment conditions, including health insurance and a canteen.

How to apply
Please send your application, labelled ‘metal caster’ to hlsv@skivekommune.dk
Place of work: Skive, Denmark
Start date: As soon as possible

For more information, contact Production Manager Mikael Poulsen on phone: +45 52 14 68 08.

Check out our website here: www.ide-pro.com

Newcomer Service – Supporting your move to the Skive Area
Are you curious about life in Denmark and the Skive Area, or do you have questions about life for you and your family? Click on this link: www.jobcenterskive.dk/newcomerservice

Idé-Pro is one of Europe's leading manufacturers of prototypes and low-volume production in plastic, light metal, and EPS/EPP and has 300 employees in Skive (DK), Glyngøre (DK), Gothenburg (SE), and Bangalore (IN).

Operatør af en drejebænk til metalforarbejdning
